name: SCUFF(ED)
description:
Brawl it out in a Super Casual Ultimate Fight Fest (Extra Deluxe) [SCUFFED], where up to 6 players can fight for the top by customizing their loadouts with more than 20 skill-altering passives! The player with the most points at the end of 6 rounds wins!

Features
  • Up to 6 players online
  • 4 different classes
  • Various game changing passives
  • 3 different Arenas

Choose from 4 unique classes, each fitted with 2 skills.


Customize abilities after each round.


Pick from a variety of passives as well as one game altering passive every game!
